Pindrop Security | Atlanta, GA | Full-Time | Onsite

We fight phone fraud with science! More about our company can be found here: <http://www.pindropsecurity.com/>.

Great culture, growing fast, big market. Lots of opportunity to make a difference in multiple areas (Data Science/Research, Product, Software Engineering to name just a few). Looking for talented problem solvers at multiple levels of the stack: Python, C++, Java, Ruby, JavaScript.

If you're interested in VOIP and/or security, we have great opportunities. Get in touch.
